TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OdbcConnectionStringBuilder extends System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder
Public NotInheritable Class OdbcConnectionStringBuilder Inherits DbConnectionStringBuilder
.class public auto ansi sealed OdbcConnectionStringBuilder extends System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder

summary.span: 为创建和管理由 类使用的连接字符串的内容提供了一种简单方法。

span.span: Provides a simple way to create and manage the contents of connection strings used by the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 连接字符串生成器允许开发人员以编程方式创建语法正确的连接字符串，并使用类的属性和方法来分析和重新生成现有的连接字符串。The connection string builders let developers programmatically create syntactically correct connection strings, and parse and rebuild existing connection strings, using properties and methods of the class. 连接字符串生成器提供了与 ODBC 连接所允许的已知键/值对相对应的强类型属性，开发人员可以为任何其他连接字符串值添加任意键/值对。The connection string builder provides strongly typed properties corresponding to the known key/value pairs allowed by ODBC connections, and developers can add arbitrary key/value pairs for any other connection string values. 需要在应用程序中创建连接字符串的开发人员可以使用 类生成和修改连接字符串。Developers needing to create connection strings as part of applications can use the class to build and modify connection strings. 使用该类还可以轻松管理存储在应用程序配置文件中的连接字符串。The class also makes it easy to manage connection strings stored in an application configuration file. 仅对有限的一组已知键/值对执行检查。 performs checks only for the limited set of known key/value pairs. 因此，此类可用于创建无效的连接字符串。Therefore, this class can be used to create invalid connection strings. 下表列出了特定的已知密钥及其在类中的相应属性 及其默认值。The following table lists the specific known keys together with their corresponding properties within the class, and their default values. 除了这些特定值外，开发人员也可以将任何键/值对添加到该实例中包含的集合 。Besides these specific values, developers can add any key/value pairs to the collection that is contained within the instance. |键Key|propertiesProperty|评论Comment|默认值Default value| |---------|--------------|-------------|-------------------| |驱动程序Driver||开发人员在设置属性时不应包含驱动程序名称周围的大括号 。Developers should not include the braces surrounding the driver name when they set the property. 实例根据需要添加大括号。The instance adds braces as needed.|空字符串Empty string| |DSNDSN|||空字符串Empty string| 如果连接字符串中的值) (以外的任何值 包含分号 (; ) ，则在 连接字符串中使用引号将值引起来。If any value (other than the value) within the connection string contains a semicolon (;), the surrounds the value with quotation marks in the connection string. 为了避免此 类常包含分号的值出现此问题， 类始终使用大括号将此值括起来。In order to avoid this issue with the value that frequently contains a semicolon, the class always surrounds this value with braces. ODBC 规范指示包含分号的驱动程序值必须括在大括号内，此类将为您处理此情况。The ODBC specification indicates that driver values that contain semicolons must be surrounded with braces, and this class handles this for you. 属性处理尝试插入恶意代码。The property handles attempts to insert malicious code. 例如，下面的代码使用 索引器 (的默认属性（在 c # 中） ) 正确地转义嵌套的键/值对。For example, the following code, using the default property (the indexer, in C#) correctly escapes the nested key/value pair. ```vb Dim builder As _ New System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder ' Take advantage of the Driver property. builder.Driver = "SQL Server" builder("Server") = "MyServer;NewValue=Bad" Console.WriteLine(builder.ConnectionString) ``` ```csharp System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder builder = new System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder(); // Take advantage of the Driver property. builder.Driver = "SQL Server"; builder["Server"] = "MyServer;NewValue=Bad"; Console.WriteLine(builder.ConnectionString); ``` 结果为以下连接字符串，该字符串以安全方式处理无效值：The result is the following connection string that handles the invalid value in a safe manner: ``` Driver={SQL Server};Server="MyServer;NewValue=Bad" ``` ## Examples 下面的控制台应用程序为多个 ODBC 数据库生成连接字符串。The following console application builds connection strings for several ODBC databases. 首先，该示例将创建一个 Microsoft Access 数据库的连接字符串。First, the example creates a connection string for a Microsoft Access database. 然后，它将创建一个用于 IBM DB2 数据库的连接字符串。It then creates a connection string for an IBM DB2 database. 该示例还分析了现有的连接字符串，并演示了处理连接字符串内容的各种方式。The example also parses an existing connection string, and demonstrates various ways of manipulating the contents of the connection string. > [!NOTE] > 该示例包括一个密码以演示 如何使用连接字符串。This example includes a password to demonstrate how works with connection strings. 在您的应用程序中，建议使用 Windows 身份验证。In your applications, we recommend that you use Windows Authentication. 如果必须使用密码，请不要在你的应用程序中包括硬编码的密码。If you must use a password, do not include a hard-coded password in your application. [!code-csharp[DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string connectionString) cil managed

param.name: connectionString
param.span: 对象内部连接信息的基础。

span.span: The basis for the object's internal connection information.
Parsed into key/value pairs.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 所提供的连接字符串为实例的内部连接信息提供数据。

span.span: The provided connection string provides the data for the instance's internal connection information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在构造函数中传递连接字符串，也可以 显式设置属性。You can pass a connection string in the constructor, or you can set the property explicitly. 此行为是相同的。The behavior is the same either way. ## Examples 下面的示例创建多个 实例，并将不同的连接字符串传递给每个事例中的构造函数。The following example creates multiple instances, passing a different connection string to the constructor in each case. 请注意，在检索属性时，可能会修改连接字符串内的元素的顺序 。Note that the ordering of elements within the connection string may be modified when you retrieve the property. 另请注意，除预定义的 "Dsn" 和 "Driver" 键以外的键都按类转换为小写 。Also note that keys other than the predefined "Dsn" and "Driver" keys are converted to lowercase by the class. > [!NOTE] > 该示例包括一个密码以演示 如何使用连接字符串。This example includes a password to demonstrate how works with connection strings. 在您的应用程序中，建议使用 Windows 身份验证。In your applications, we recommend that you use Windows Authentication. 如果必须使用密码，请不要在你的应用程序中包括硬编码的密码。If you must use a password, do not include a hard-coded password in your application. [!code-csharp[DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Multiple#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Multiple/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Multiple#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Multiple/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 连接字符串的格式错误（可能是键/值对中缺少必需的“=”）。

span.span: The connection string is incorrectly formatted (perhaps missing the required "=" within a key/value pair).

span.span: Clears the contents of the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将删除中的所有键/值对 ，并将 和属性重置 为其默认值。The method removes all key/value pairs from the and resets the and properties to their default values. 方法还将属性设置 为0，并将 属性设置为空字符串。The method also sets the property to 0 and the property to an empty string. ## Examples [!code-csharp[DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Clear#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Clear/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Clear#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Clear/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Driver { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Driver : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置与连接关联的 ODBC 驱动程序的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the ODBC driver associated with the connection.

value.span: 为 属性的值，或者，如果未提供任何值，则为 。

span.span: The value of the property, or if none has been supplied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在您尝试设置此属性时传入的值为 null，则将重置 属性。If the value passed in is null when you try to set the property, the property is reset. 如果尚未设置值，而开发人员尝试检索属性，则返回值为 `String.Empty` 。If the value has not been set and the developer tries to retrieve the property, the return value is `String.Empty`. 此属性与连接字符串中的 "Driver" 键相对应。This property corresponds to the "Driver" key within the connection string.

span.span: The value of the property, or if none has been supplied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在您尝试设置此属性时传入的值为 null，则将重置 属性。If the value passed in is null when you try to set the property, the property is reset. 如果尚未设置值，而开发人员尝试检索属性，则返回值为 `String.Empty` 。If the value has not been set and the developer tries to retrieve the property, the return value is `String.Empty`. 此属性与连接字符串中的 "Dsn" 键相对应。This property corresponds to the "Dsn" key within the connection string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性时，如果字典中已存在指定的键，则替换该值;否则，将创建一个新元素。When you set this property, if the specified key already exists in the dictionary, the value is replaced; otherwise, a new element is created. ## Examples 以下代码在控制台应用程序中新建一个 ，并使用 属性将键/值对添加到其连接字符串中。The following code, in a console application, creates a new and adds key/value pairs to its connection string, using the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 中值的顺序与 属性返回的中的关联值顺序相同 。The order of the values in the is the same order as the associated values in the returned by the property. ## Examples 以下控制台应用程序示例新建一个 。The following console application example creates a new . 该代码循环访问显示键/值对的 属性返回的 。The code loops through the returned by the property displaying the key/value pairs. > [!NOTE] > 该示例包括一个密码以演示 如何使用连接字符串。This example includes a password to demonstrate how works with connection strings. 在您的应用程序中，建议使用 Windows 身份验证。In your applications, we recommend that you use Windows Authentication. 如果必须使用密码，请不要在你的应用程序中包括硬编码的密码。If you must use a password, do not include a hard-coded password in your application. Public Overrides Function Remove (keyword As String) As Boolean

param.name: keyword
param.span: 要从此 中的连接字符串移除的键/值对中的键。

span.span: The key of the key/value pair to be removed from the connection string in this .

summary.span: 从 实例中移除具有指定的键的项。

span.span: Removes the entry with the specified key from the instance.

returns.span: 如果该键存在于连接字符串中并已被移除，则为 ；如果该键不存在，则为 。

span.span: if the key existed within the connection string and was removed; if the key did not exist.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于 方法返回一个指示成功的值，因此在尝试从实例中删除键/值对之前，不需要查找密钥的存在 。Because the method returns a value that indicates its success, it is not required to look for the existence of a key before trying to remove the key/value pair from the instance. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 实例，并演示该方法的行为 。The following example creates an instance and demonstrates the behavior of the method. [!code-csharp[DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Remove#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Remove/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Remove#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Remove/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool TryGetValue (string keyword, out object value);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance bool TryGetValue(string keyword, [out] object& value) cil managed
Public Overrides Function TryGetValue (keyword As String, ByRef value As Object) As Boolean
public: override bool TryGetValue(System::String ^ keyword, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::Object ^ % value);
public override bool TryGetValue (string keyword, out object? value);

span.span: The key of the item to retrieve.
The value corresponding to .

summary.span: 从此 中检索与提供的键相对应的值。

span.span: Retrieves a value corresponding to the supplied key from this .

returns.span: 如果在连接字符串中找到 ，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if was found within the connection string; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法允许开发人员安全地从 中检索值，而无需验证提供的键名是否为有效的键名。The method lets developers safely retrieve a value from a without needing to verify that the supplied key name is a valid key name. 由于在 传入不存在的键时不会引发异常，因此在检索其值之前无需查找密钥。Because does not raise an exception when you pass in a nonexistent key, you do not have to look for a key before retrieving its value. 使用不存在的键调用会将值 null (`Nothing`) 参数的 Visual Basic 中 `value` 。Calling with a nonexistent key places the value null (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) in the `value` parameter. ## Examples 下面的示例演示方法的行为 。The following example demonstrates the behavior of the method. [!code-csharp[DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.TryGetValue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.TryGetValue/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.TryGetValue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.TryGetValue/VB/source.vb#1)]
